trans-unit.source: Gives access to the entity and an <xref uid="langword_csharp_XLinq" name="XLinq" href=""></xref> object that represents an Atom entry.
trans-unit.target: 엔터티에 대 한 액세스를 제공 및 <xref uid="langword_csharp_XLinq" name="XLinq" href=""> </xref> Atom 항목을 나타내는 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: ReadingWritingEntityEventArgs is used with the <xref href="System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceContext.ReadingEntity"></xref> and <xref href="System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceContext.WritingEntity"></xref> events.
trans-unit.target: ReadingWritingEntityEventArgs와 함께 사용 되는 <xref href="System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceContext.ReadingEntity"> </xref> 및 <xref href="System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceContext.WritingEntity"> </xref> 이벤트입니다.

trans-unit.source: ReadingWritingEntityEventArgs are used with the <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceContext.ReadingEntity> and <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceContext.WritingEntity> events.
Gets an XML Atom entry or feed data represented as <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XElement>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XElement>.</xref:System.Xml.Linq.XElement> 로 표현 하는 XML Atom 항목 또는 피드 데이터를 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: The Atom entry or feed data is read from a GET request or a POST request about to be sent to the data service.
trans-unit.target: Atom 항목이 나 피드 데이터는 GET 요청 또는 데이터 서비스에 전송 하려는 POST 요청에서 읽습니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the object representation of data returned from the <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.ReadingWritingEntityEventArgs.Data*> property.
trans-unit.target: 반환 된 데이터의 개체 표현을 가져옵니다는 <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.ReadingWritingEntityEventArgs.Data*>속성.</xref:System.Data.Services.Client.ReadingWritingEntityEventArgs.Data*>

trans-unit.source: This object is populated for both incoming and outgoing entities.
trans-unit.target: 이 개체에 대 한 들어오는 엔터티와 나가는 엔터티 채워집니다.
